en-US.name: GitKraken Glo Boards
en-US.summary: This is an Alexa extension to manage GitKraken Glo Boards
en-US.description:
The GitKraken Glo Boards Alexa helps you by providing a platform to create, manage and keep tracks of you daily tasks.
A handy tool to get updates on Glo boards on Alexa with your voice.
Things you can do right now with Glo Boards Alexa :
- List, Create, Select, Delete Boards
- List, Create, Delete Columns
- Create, Delete and List cards due for a particular date like today.
- And obviously Sign in to your account.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Glow Boards for tasks due today.
Alexa, ask Glow Boards to add a card very important feature.
en-US.updatesDescription:
Initial Release :
- Account Linking with GitKraken Glo Boards
- List, Create, Select, Delete Boards
- List, Create, Delete Columns
- Create, Delete and List cards due for a particular date like today
- More features coming soon!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
You can start the testing after obtaining gitkraken accessToken by following the Sign in functions :
SignIn - sign in
Rest of the actions can be completed after obtaining gitkraken accessToken : 
ListBoards - list all boards
SelectBoard - select a board
AddBoard - add a board
DeleteBoard - delete a board
ListColumns - list columns
AddColumn - add a column
DeleteColumn - delete a column
AddCard - add a card
MoveCard - move a card
DeleteCard - delete a card
TasksDue - tasks due
